short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online image editor supporting PSD, Sketch and XCF files (Photoshop, Sketch App and Gimp).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Photopea is a free online image editor, that runs without plugins. It can both read and save PSD files.

PP can work with layer styles, masks, smart objects, text layers and more.

Adjustments: Brightness, Contrast, Levels, Curves, Vibrance, Hue, Saturation.
